member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO
member.summary: Contains standard Int13 drive geometry parameters.

member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO.DriveSelect
member.summary: The letter that is related to the specified partition or hard disk. For valid values, see the BIOS documentation.

member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO.MaxCylinders
member.summary: The maximum number of cylinders per head. For valid values, see the BIOS documentation.

member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO.SectorsPerTrack
member.summary: The number of sectors per track. For valid values, see the BIOS documentation.

member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO.MaxHeads
member.summary: The maximum number of heads for this hard disk. For valid values, see the BIOS documentation.

member.name: DISK_INT13_INFO.NumberDrives
member.summary: The number of drives. For valid values, see the BIOS documentation.
